TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrustRelationshipInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The TrustRelationshipInformation class contains information for a trust relationship between a pair of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects.
Obtains the name of the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects for this trust relationship.
Docs.value: A string that contains the name of the source <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects for this trust relationship.

Docs.summary: Obtains the name of the target <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects for this trust relationship.
Docs.value: A string that contains the name of the target <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects for this trust relationship.

Docs.summary: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> objects for this trust relationship relative to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects that created the trust.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection"> value for this trust relationship relative to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest> objects that created the trust.

Docs.summary: Obtains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"> object of the trust relationship.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustType"> value that represents the type of the trust relationship.
